channel.title: CVE Feed for Sagemcom -- FAST3686 V2 Vodafone
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sagemcom -- FAST3686 V2 Vodafone

item.title: CVE-2024-1623|2024-03-14T12:47:40.629Z -- sagemcom -- fast3686%20v2%20vodafone
item.description: Insufficient session timeout vulnerability in the FAST3686 V2 Vodafone router from Sagemcom. This vulnerability could allow a local attacker to access the administration panel without requiring login credentials. This vulnerability is possible because the 'Login.asp and logout.asp' files do not handle session details correctly.
